title: Fabric Dining Chair
body: Designed in 1950s by Grant Featherston, the Fabric Dining Chair is as sensational as it was when it was first released. With its contoured seating and organic elegance, the modern dining chair strikes the ideal balance between function and form. These beautifully upholstered dining chairs create a warm, inviting seating option with a unique style that will add that extra touch of class to your dinner party!
